topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Step 4 - Deploying the Denver Template

body.p: After the lifecycle manager is installed, the next task in installing the Denver topology is to deploy the HP Helion OpenStack cloud.

If you are installing the denver template, which includes the KVM Region and uses AVS networking, follow these instructions. If you are installing a different deployment, disregard these instructions.
